rule.name: reportRadioButtonField
rule.description: Runtime equivalent to the mockups repository's component_radio.html
rule.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dashboardLayout"( firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Standard Radio Button Group", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", instructions: "Radio button group (no default selection)", choiceLabels: {"Apple", "Banana", "Orange"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "STACKED" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Radio Button Group With Default", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", instructions: "Radio button group (second item selected by default)", choiceLabels: {"Apple", "Banana", "Orange"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "STACKED", value: 2 ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Disabled", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {"Apple", "Banana", "Orange"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "STACKED", value: 2, disabled: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Single Radio", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", instructions: "Not recommended", choiceLabels: {"Just Me"}, choiceValues: {1}, choiceLayout: "STACKED" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "No Label", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {""}, choiceValues: {1}, choiceLayout: "STACKED" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "No Radios", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", instructions: "Instructions", choiceLayout: "STACKED" ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Layout Options", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Stacked Layout", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {"First", "Second", "Third"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "STACKED", value: 1 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( labelPosition: "COLLAPSED", instructions: "No field label", choiceLabels: {"First", "Second", "Third"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "STACKED", value: 1 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Stacked With Label Above", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: {"First", "Second", "Third"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "STACKED", value: 1 ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Compact Layout", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {"Yes", "No", "Maybe"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "COMPACT", value: 2 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( labelPosition: "COLLAPSED", instructions: "No field label", choiceLabels: {"Yes", "No", "Maybe"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "COMPACT", value: 2 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Compact With Label Above", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: {"Yes", "No", "Maybe"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3}, choiceLayout: "COMPACT", value: 2 ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "One-Column Section, Compact Layout", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Department", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {"Engineering", "PS", "Sales", "Marketing", "Other"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}, choiceLayout: "COMPACT", value: 1 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Company Tenure", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {"<1 year", "1-3 years", "3-6 years", ">6 years"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3, 4}, choiceLayout: "COMPACT", value: 2 ) }, secondColumnContents: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout"( label: "Wrapping Examples", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Long Labels With Stacked Layout", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {"Mr. Fogg learned all this in consulting his Bradshaw, which gave him the daily movements of the trans-Atlantic steamers", "Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa", "Short", "Short", "Short"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}, choiceLayout: "STACKED", value: 1 ) }, secondColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Long Labels With Compact Layout", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {"Mr. Fogg learned all this in consulting his Bradshaw, which gave him the daily movements of the trans-Atlantic steamers", "Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa", "Short", "Short", "Short"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}, choiceLayout: "COMPACT", value: 1 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Choices Wrap", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", choiceLabels: {"Apple", "Banana", "Orange", "Strawberry", "Blueberry", "Raspberry"}, choiceValues: {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6}, choiceLayout: "COMPACT", value: 2 ) } ) } )
